title: Formulaic Sequences ve Kalıplaşmış İfadeler - Ünite Testi

questions.question: It ---- that the new technology will revolutionize the healthcare industry.
questions.explanation: 'It is widely believed that...' kalıplaşmış ifade. Passive yapı kullanılır.

questions.question: The decline in sales can ---- the recent economic downturn.
questions.explanation: 'Can be attributed to' = ...atfedilebilir. Passive yapı ve 'to' edatı sabittir.

questions.question: The study ---- that bilingual children develop better cognitive flexibility.
questions.explanation: 'The study suggests that...' kalıbında active voice, Simple Present kullanılır.

questions.question: It ---- saying that effective communication is crucial for team success.
questions.explanation: 'It goes without saying that...' sabit ifade, Simple Present kullanılır.

questions.question: This problem ---- the lack of adequate funding for research and development.
questions.explanation: 'This stems from...' = Bu...dan kaynaklanmaktadır. Simple Present tercih edilir.

questions.question: It ---- to reason that higher education levels correlate with better employment opportunities.
questions.explanation: 'It stands to reason that...' sabit ifade, Simple Present.

questions.question: The evidence ---- to the fact that social media usage affects mental health.
questions.explanation: 'The evidence points to the fact that...' kalıbı Simple Present kullanır.

questions.question: It should ---- that the sample size was relatively small.
questions.explanation: 'It should be noted that...' doğru kalıp. Modal + passive yapı.

questions.question: The findings ---- that early intervention can significantly improve outcomes.
questions.explanation: 'The findings indicate that...' kalıbı Simple Present kullanır.

questions.question: This approach ---- several ethical concerns that must be addressed.
questions.explanation: 'This gives rise to...' = Bu... yol açmaktadır. Simple Present kullanılır.

questions.question: It ---- important to note that correlation does not imply causation.
questions.explanation: 'It is important to note that...' kalıplaşmış akademik ifade.

questions.question: The results ---- that there has been a significant shift in consumer preferences.
questions.explanation: 'The results demonstrate that...' Simple Present ile kullanılır.

questions.question: It ---- worth noting that the study had several limitations.
questions.explanation: 'It is worth noting that...' = Belirtmeye değer ki... Sabit ifade.

questions.question: This phenomenon can ---- several interconnected factors.
questions.explanation: 'Can be attributed to' modal passive yapı. Phenomenon (olgu) atfedilen şeydir.

questions.question: The data ---- that environmental factors play a crucial role.
questions.explanation: 'The data reveal that...' Simple Present ile kullanılır. Data çoğul kabul edilir.

questions.question: It ---- widely accepted that exercise benefits mental health.
questions.explanation: 'It is widely accepted that...' genel kabul gören gerçekler için kullanılan kalıp.

questions.question: This leads ---- the conclusion that further research is needed.
questions.explanation: 'This leads to the conclusion that...' kalıbında 'to' edatı kullanılır.

questions.question: A case ---- point is the economic development of South Korea.
questions.explanation: 'A case in point' = Konuyla ilgili bir örnek. Sabit preposition kullanımı.

questions.question: It ---- assumed that participants had prior knowledge of the topic.
questions.explanation: Geçmiş bir varsayım anlatıldığı için 'It was assumed that...' kullanılır.

questions.question: The theory ---- from the idea that humans are inherently social beings.
questions.explanation: 'The theory stems from...' temel fikri belirtirken Simple Present kullanılır.
